content.overview: This section details the AI agent frameworks in ğŸœ° ObeliskOS, leveraging ğŸœƒ Dark_Star for scroll_writer, task_executor, and ui_emotion roles, as defined in starship_crew.json (wave 14). Agents are loaded via cast_loader.py and interfaced through cast_builder_server.py, supporting ğŸœ OGFâ€™s UI workflows.

math.agent_latency: L_a = t_l + t_e, where t_l â‰ˆ 0.002 s (loading), t_e â‰ˆ 0.001 s (execution), targeting L_a < 0.003 s (Fire Ring).
math.throughput: T_a = N_a / L_a, where N_a = 1,000 agents, yielding T_a â‰ˆ 333,333 agents/s.
